ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: As for those who had iman in Our Signs and became Muslims:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: For (those of) you on that day who believed in My revelations and submitted.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: you who believed in Our Signs and had surrendered yourselves (to Us)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Those who have faith in Our revelations and have submitted themselves to Our will,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who believed in Our signs, and were Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (You) who believed in Our Ayat and were Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Those who believed in Our communications and were submissive:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: even those who believed in Our signs, and had surrendered themselves
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Ye) who believed Our revelations and were self-surrendered,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: those who believed in Our revelations and surrendered themselves to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Ye who believed in Our revelations and were Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —those who believed in Our signs and had been Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Being) those who have believed in Our Signs and bowed (their wills to Ours) in Islam.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (You) who believed in Our Ayat (proofs, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) and were Muslims (i.e. who submit totally to Allah's Will, and believe in the Oneness of Allah - Islamic Monotheism).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: to those who believed in Our verses and were Muslims,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who believed in Our revelations, and were submissive.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [You] who believed in Our verses and were Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:69] those who believed (alladhīna āmanū adjectivally qualifies ‘ibādī, ‘My servants’) in Our signs — the Qur’ān — and had submitted themselves [to Me].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Ye) who believed Our revelations) Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an (and were self surrendered) sincere to Allah in their worship and confession of Allah's divine Oneness,
